statements: SELECT * FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id = 1;
SELECT stage_name, growth_description FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_name LIKE '%seedling%';
SELECT stage_id, stage_name FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE optimal_conditions LIKE '%water%' ORDER BY stage_id DESC;
SELECT stage_id, stage_name, growth_description FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT stage_name, growth_description FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id = 1
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_name = 'Flowering' ORDER BY stage_id DESC
SELECT stage_id, stage_name FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE growth_description LIKE '%optimal%' AND stage_id > 2 ORDER BY stage_name ASC
SELECT stage_name AS Name, growth_description AS Description, optimal_conditions AS Conditions FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id IN (3, 4, 5) ORDER BY stage_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Stages FROM crop_growth_stages
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_stages ORDER BY stage_id ASC;
SELECT stage_description, estimated_duration_hours FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE estimated_duration_hours > 10;
SELECT stage_id, stage_description FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id = 2;
SELECT field_id, temperature, humidity, soil_moisture FROM field_conditions WHERE temperature >= 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT stage_id, stage_description, estimated_duration_hours FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id = 1;
SELECT stage_description, estimated_duration_hours, stage_id FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id != 3 ORDER BY stage_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM field_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT field_id, temperature, humidity, soil_moisture FROM field_conditions WHERE soil_moisture BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY field_id ASC;
SELECT stage_description, estimated_duration_hours, stage_id FROM crop_growth_stages AS cgs JOIN field_conditions AS fc ON cgs.stage_id = fc.field_id WHERE fc.temperature <= 30;
SELECT * FROM CropGrowthStages;
SELECT stage_name, end_date FROM CropGrowthStages WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT condition_name, temperature, humidity FROM FieldConditions WHERE wind_speed >= 10;
SELECT crop_id, field_id FROM CropFieldMapping WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CropFieldMapping WHERE stage_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CropGrowthStages WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT stage_name, end_date FROM CropGrowthStages ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT CropFieldMapping.crop_id, FieldConditions.temperature FROM CropFieldMapping JOIN FieldConditions ON CropFieldMapping.field_id = FieldConditions.condition_id WHERE FieldConditions.humidity > 70;
SELECT stage_name, start_date, end_date FROM CropGrowthStages WHERE stage_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity), MIN(wind_speed) FROM FieldConditions;
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_stages;
SELECT stage_id, stage_name FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE duration_in_days > 30;
SELECT description FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM field_conditions ORDER BY temperature_celsius DESC;
SELECT farm_area_id, area_name, location FROM farm_areas WHERE soil_type = 'Clay';
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_stages ORDER BY stage_name DESC;
SELECT stage_id, stage_name, duration_in_days FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE duration_in_days > 10 ORDER BY stage_id;

SELECT c.stage_name, cr.date_recorded, fc.temperature_celsius, fc.humidity_percent FROM crop_growth_stages c JOIN crop_records cr ON c.stage_id = cr.stage_id JOIN field_conditions fc ON cr.field_condition_id = fc.condition_id WHERE fc.temperature_celsius > 25 AND fc.humidity_percent < 70;

SELECT cr.record_id, c.stage_name, fc.rainfall_mm, fa.area_name FROM crop_records cr JOIN crop_growth_stages c ON cr.stage_id = c.stage_id JOIN field_conditions fc ON cr.field_condition_id = fc.condition_id JOIN farm_areas fa ON fc.farm_area_id = fa.farm_area_id WHERE fc.rainfall_mm > 50;

SELECT DISTINCT cr.crop_id, fg.stage_name, fc.temperature_celsius, fa.location FROM crop_records cr JOIN crop_growth_stages fg ON cr.stage_id = fg.stage_id JOIN field_conditions fc ON cr.field_condition_id = fc.condition_id JOIN farm_areas fa ON fc.farm_area_id = fa.farm_area_id WHERE fa.location LIKE '%valley%' ORDER BY cr.crop_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_stages
SELECT stage_name, temperature FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE humidity > 70
SELECT field_id, weather FROM field_conditions ORDER BY field_id DESC
SELECT planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_data WHERE yield > 1000
SELECT sensor_id, reading, timestamp FROM sensor_data LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY stage_name DESC

SELECT crop_data.crop_id, crop_data.planting_date, crop_data.harvest_date, field_conditions.field_id FROM crop_data INNER JOIN field_conditions ON crop_data.field_id = field_conditions.field_id WHERE crop_data.yield > 1000
SELECT stage_name, temperature, humidity FROM crop_growth_stages WHERE stage_name LIKE 'Germination%'
SELECT field_id, weather, irrigation_needed FROM field_conditions WHERE weather = 'Sunny' AND irrigation_needed = TRUE

SELECT sensors.sensor_id, sensors.sensor_type, sensor_data.reading, sensor_data.timestamp FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id ORDER BY sensor_data.timestamp DESC
